sentences.sContent: I’m going to ask her to marry me on St Valentine’s Day.
sentences.sCn: 我打算在情人节向她求婚。

sentences.sContent: She married young (= at a young age ) .
People in higher social classes are more likely to marry late (= when they are older than is usual ) .
sentences.sCn: 社会阶层较高的人士倾向于晚婚。

sentences.sContent: Sophia had, in a sense, married beneath her (= married someone of a lower social class than her ) .
sentences.sCn: 索菲娅在某种意义上是下嫁了。

words.tran: 已婚的，有配偶的；婚姻的，夫妇的；密切结合的
结婚；婚姻生活；密切结合，合并

trans.tranOther: if you marry someone, you become their husband or wife
